headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://vercel.live; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://vercel.live; font-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'self' https://vercel.live;
